knimeNode.name: Duration/Period to String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a duration or period to a string.

fullDescription.intro: Converts duration or period cells to string cells. The string representation of these periods or durations can be either the ISO-8601, a short (using letters), or a long (using words) representation.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be converted.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Format Selection
tab.option: The durations or periods will be formatted using the ISO-8601 representation, e.g. 'P2Y3M5D'.
The durations or periods will be formatted using words to represent, e.g. '2 years 3 months 5 days'.
The durations or periods will be formatted using letters to represent, e.g. '2y 3M 5d' (Period: y: years, M: months, d: days; Duration: H: hours, m: minutes, s: seconds).
